xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: zip:binary-entry
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: zip:binary-entry($href as xs:anyURI, $entry as xs:string) as xs:base64Binary

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Extracts the binary stream from the file positioned at $entry within the ZIP file identified by $href and returns it as a Base64 item.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $href The URI for locating the Zip file
$entry The entry within the Zip file to address
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:base64Binary : The binary representation of the entry from the Zip file.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: zip:html-entry
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: zip:html-entry($href as xs:anyURI, $entry as xs:string) as document-node()

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Extracts the html file positioned at $entry within the ZIP file identified by $href, and returns a document node. Because an HTML document is not necessarily a well-formed XML document, an implementation may use a specific parser in order to produce an XDM document node, like [TagSoup] or [HTML Tidy]; the details of this process are implementation-defined.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $href The URI for locating the Zip file
$entry The entry within the Zip file to address
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: document-node() : The document-node of the entry from the Zip file.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: zip:text-entry
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: zip:text-entry($href as xs:anyURI, $entry as xs:string) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Extracts the contents of the text file positioned at entry within the ZIP file identified by $href and returns it as a string.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $href The URI for locating the Zip file
$entry The entry within the Zip file to address
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:string : The string value of the entry from the Zip file.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: zip:xml-entry
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: zip:xml-entry($href as xs:anyURI, $entry as xs:string) as document-node()

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Extracts the content from the XML file positioned at $entry within the ZIP file identified by $href and returns it as a document-node.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $href The URI for locating the Zip file
$entry The entry within the Zip file to address
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: document-node() : The document-node of the entry from the Zip file.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a zip:file element that describes the hierarchical structure of the ZIP file identified by $href in terms of ZIP entries
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $href The URI for locating the Zip file
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: node() : The document node containing a zip:entry

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: zip:update
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: zip:update($href as xs:anyURI, $paths as xs:string+, $binaries as xs:base64Binary+) as xs:base64Binary?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a copy of the zip file at $href, after replacing or adding each binary using the matching path/filename in $paths.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $href The URI for locating the Zip file
$binaries+ a sequence of binaries matching the paths
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:base64Binary? : The new zipped data or the empty sequence if the numbers of $paths and $binaries are different
